comment.body:
Why I can't update by clicking on ZeroHello ->"Version" -> "Update" ?
I've done this a lot of time, but it does nothing .

> [tangdou](#comment_4_1K7tW4WEbso38uMs4RN3W7GihA6tTqrApz): It also can work for me.


¯\(º_o)/¯ I don't know why. In the end I cloned the repository with ```git clone``` and I manually updated it .
